findings.title: Sandbox Mode Disabled
findings.description: Sandbox mode is disabled, tools run directly on host
findings.impact: Tool execution can access and modify the host system

findings.title: Web Fetch SSRF Protection Not Strict
findings.impact: May allow access to internal network resources

findings.title: Web Search SSRF Protection Not Strict
findings.impact: May allow access to internal network resources

findings.title: DM Scope Not Explicitly Set
findings.impact: May expose messages to wrong context

findings.title: Gateway Token in Configuration File
findings.description: Gateway token is stored directly in config file
findings.impact: Config file should be protected with appropriate permissions
findings.remediation: Ensure config file has restricted permissions (600)

findings.title: Potential Secret Detected in Config
findings.description: Found potential secret pattern 'sk-' in configuration
findings.remediation: Review and ensure secrets are properly secured or redacted

findings.title: Tool 'gateway' Not in Deny List
findings.description: Gateway tool - can modify config, run updates
findings.impact: Agent can use this powerful tool

findings.title: Tool 'cron' Not in Deny List
findings.impact: Agent can use this powerful tool

findings.title: Tool 'sessions_spawn' Not in Deny List
findings.impact: Agent can use this powerful tool

findings.title: Tool 'sessions_send' Not in Deny List
findings.description: Sessions send - can send cross-session messages
findings.impact: Agent can use this powerful tool

findings.title: Prompt Injection Detection Informational
findings.description: This scanner detects configuration paths that could amplify injection impact, not injection itself
findings.impact: Prompt injection alone is expected behavior - we only flag chains to bypass
